configuration_started_message: Configuration started. Check your DM to start setting up the bot!
configuration_timed_out_message: Timed out waiting for configuration. Please answer the questions within 60 seconds.
send_button_to_channel_description: The channel to send the button to.
configuration_not_cancelled_message: Configuration not cancelled. Let's make like this never happened...
configuration_cancel_confirmation_messag: Are you sure you want to cancel the configuration?
configuration_timeout_confirmation_messa: You are not sure I guess...
start_config_message:
Welcome to the configuration!

To start setting up the bot, please specify the CHANNEL ID of the channel you want the bot to post the forms to.

Example: `988216045682696204`. If you want to keep default, just type `default`.

To cancel the configuration, type `cancel`.
app_title_message:
Please enter the title that you want to use for your application.

To cancel the configuration, type `cancel`.
configuration_title_message: Application title has been set to **{}**.
